items.sentence: Tom certainly looks better than he did last week.
Tom should have paid attention to what Mary said.
Am I the only one here who doesn\'t speak French?
In all probability, we\'ll arrive before they do.
I\'m sick and tired of all of Tom\'s complaining.
I\'m sorry, I didn\'t mean to hurt your feelings.
Everyone is looking forward to watching the game.
Everyone was surprised when I went into the room.
Fear of losing power corrupts those who wield it.
Tom promised me he\'d never come back here again.
